text.content:
sequenceDiagram
    participant M as 🛍️ Merchant
    participant PG as 🔗 Gateway
    participant ACQ as 🏦 Acquirer
    participant CN as 🌐 Network
    participant ISS as 💳 Issuer
    participant LOG as 📜 Logger
    participant NOTI as 📢 Notification
    participant P as 👤 Payer

    M->>PG: Send reversal request
    PG->>ACQ: Forward reversal
    ACQ->>CN: Forward reversal
    CN->>ISS: Forward reversal

    ISS->>ISS: Release held funds
    ISS->>LOG: Log reversal event
    LOG->>NOTI: Trigger reversal notification
    NOTI-->>P: Funds released (Authorization Reversed)

rich_text.plain_text:
sequenceDiagram
    participant M as 🛍️ Merchant
    participant PG as 🔗 Gateway
    participant ACQ as 🏦 Acquirer
    participant CN as 🌐 Network
    participant ISS as 💳 Issuer
    participant LOG as 📜 Logger
    participant NOTI as 📢 Notification
    participant P as 👤 Payer

    M->>PG: Send reversal request
    PG->>ACQ: Forward reversal
    ACQ->>CN: Forward reversal
    CN->>ISS: Forward reversal

    ISS->>ISS: Release held funds
    ISS->>LOG: Log reversal event
    LOG->>NOTI: Trigger reversal notification
    NOTI-->>P: Funds released (Authorization Reversed)
